desc: Memes used on Science Fiction & Fantasy

SFF.title: Shorthand for Science Fiction and Fantasy

Time Traveling Robots.title: An Internet troll originally going under the name "Rondo", asking a bunch of questions about time travelling robots

TVTropes.title: A website dedicated to examining tropes in popular media. If you see a TVTropes link, don't follow it or you'll waste half your life in a twisty maze of content

Gorilla vs. Shark.title: A phrase to denote the uselessness of arguing questions like 'who would win out X and Y?'

Because, magic.title: As some of the elements in the fictional series Harry Potter cannot be explained easily, users have resorted to posting the answer: "Because, magic". Don't you post that as ansswer, ever. Why? Because, magic

You are dead to me.title: Anytime someone in chat says or does something that Jack B. Nimble dislikes, Jack declares to the person "you're dead to me"

JKR Math.title: Describing any poor math writtne by an SFF author

Star Wars physics.title: Describing any poor science written by an SFF author

Unicorn Blood.title: In the first Harry Potter book, the antagonist Voldemort drinks the blood of a unicorn to keep himself alive

Dead Fish of Jack B Nimble.title: Once upon a time Jack B Nimble had an aquarium. It was not a very successful aquarium, and it had a high death rate
